name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Carlton LANE, Appellant

judges: Before ROBERTS, C.J., and NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Carlton LANE, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The Judgments of Sentence are affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Joseph G. Feldman, Philadelphia (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., Alan Sacks, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
467 A.2d 1302
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Carlton LANE, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 21, 1983.
Decided Dec. 5, 1983.
Joseph G. Feldman, Philadelphia (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., Alan Sacks, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before ROBERTS, C.J., and NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA, JJ.
